dmca.title: [EV1-C2478168A] Offensive/Slanderous Material on teenqueens.net causing harm & damage

causing harm & damage to family.

 (multipart/alternative) 
Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello, 
  
Below you will find a note which I have sent to the owner of the 
teenqueens.net domain requesting that some offensive material be
removed. 
  
I have received no reply. 
The phone number is no longer in service and the e-mail doesn't reply.
I 
have also sent messages in the snail mail which have not been received
or 
are being ignored. 
  
Can someone with this organization please help Jennifer and I resolve
this 
issue so we can close this and move forward with our lives? 
  
It is our hope that someone within your organization can help us get
this 
offensive harmful material removed from the intranet as our family and 
personal safety is of concern. 
  
What is happening is that people are literally fishing/mining for
Jennifer's 
living address, phone number, city of birth, etc.  Late last year people

actually found out that information and contacted her with threats of a 
personal sort.  We would like to have this content removed from the web
and 
are trying hard to accomplish that but are not successfull when we can
not 
communicate with the owners of these web sites. 
  
  
Thanks so much,  (the original message can be found below) 
/* --- 
     Christopher Rumpf 
      <mailto:crumpf@parallel-evolution.com>
crumpf@parallel-evolution.com 
     mobile: 619.254.0811 
     yim: mrrumpf 
--- */ 
  
  
Polite Request of Removal of "Celeste" from 
http://www.teenqueens.net/galleries/celeste.html 
  
Hello, 
 
My name is Christopher Rumpf. I am working with Celeste (Jennifer) to
get 
her adult content removed from the internet. We have contacted the
owners of 
the media ( <outbind://41/www.cumfiesta.com> www.cumfiesta.com) and they

have graciously removed her content from their pay service web site. We
are 
now following up with all of the various promoters of the cumfiesta.com 
website politely asking that they remove their photos of Celeste because
she 
is no longer available for download on the main website. 
 
Would it be possible for you and your team of admins to remove these
URLs 
and move the photo's/movies into a private non public_html folder? (The 
moving of the photo's into a non public_html folder will stop
google/yahoo 
image searches from returning the content after the .html pages are
removed) 
<http://www.teenqueens.net/galleries/celeste.html> 
http://www.teenqueens.net/galleries/celeste.html 
 
Or perhaps replace Celeste's pages with another model/woman? 
 
The reason we are working on this is due to her personal safety. She has

been attacked twice in 2006 by stalkers and her general safety is of
concern 
to us. People are crazy out there and we no longer want this poor
decision 
which she made when she was 20 years old to continue to effect our
family 
and life. Since the  <outbind://41/www.cumfiesta.com> www.cumfiesta.com
web 
site is no longer selling her adult content would you please be so kind
as 
to remove it from your promoting site? 
 
We been working directly with RK Netmedia on this...specifically
Mauricio 
Botero. If you would like to contact him directly to confirm all of this

that is ok too. Here is Mauricio's contact information: 
 
======================================= 
 
Mauricio (Mo) Botero 
 
RK Netmedia, Inc. 
 
Ph: 305.695.6700 
 
Fax: 305. 695.6701 
 
E-mail: mo@equantum.com 
 
======================================= 
 
We would graciously appreciate any help you can provide us on this
matter. 
 
Thank you so much for your time & have a great new year, 
 
/* --- 
 
Christopher Rumpf 
 
crumpf@parallel-evolution.com 
 
mobile: 619.254.0811 
 
yim: mrrumpf 
 
--- */
